abstracts.cdata!:
This amendment to the Loan Agreement
            pertaining to the HIV/AIDS Prevention and Control Project,
            responds to a request from the Government of the Dominican
            Republic, to permit the reallocation of loan proceeds to
            help rehabilitate the health care infrastructure in the
            Jimani region, located in the border area with Haiti, an
            area severely affected by the devastating floods of May
            2004. The amendment will incorporate the legal provisions,
            including the expansion of the Project's breadth of
            activity to finance the rehabilitation, and re-equipping of
            the health care infrastructure in the Jimani region, and the
            creation of a new category of disbursements. These
            amendments are consistent with the overall objectives of the
            Project, and justified, in view of the emergency situation
            in the region, one of the poorest in the country, where
            access to basic health services is currently hindered.
